duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and manage resources, finances, scope, and services within a functional area of Information Technology to deliver business results.
Lead and manage IT staff and resources in accordance with IT Business Plan.
Establish, maintain, and enhance relationships with business and IT partners.
Operate utilizing standard processes as defined within the Management Model.
Evaluate performance and provide coaching for IT personnel.
Prepare and manage budget for area of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline and typically 7-10 years' experience in GIS or equivalent combination of education and work experience.
PMP certification preferred for specific roles as per guidelines established by the IT Project Management Office.
In lieu of degree, 9-12 years of relevant experience.
